name: Mega Hot Fire
description:
You are a giant color ball filled with magma and lava and your goal is to trample other obstacles like trees and logs in a forest to stay alive as long as you can. Be careful, as in this game boulders and rocks are your legendary enemies!

You start off as a little boulder, but the more trees you trample, the bigger your inferno becomes stronger and turns into a classic arcade action style game fun for all ages. Be careful though the floor on the side is water, and not lava! The water will turn your super inferno into a little fire boulder again that is not hot.
